description: canvodpy is a Python package for calculating Vegetation Optical Depth (VOD) from GNSS (Global Navigation Satellite System) signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) data. It provides tools for GNSS data reading, auxiliary data handling, grid operations, storage, visualization, and VOD calculation algorithms.
title: canvodpy: GNSS Vegetation Optical Depth Analysis
